argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_rpcn | |- ( A e. RR+ -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | #P_rpne0 | |- ( A e. RR+ -> A =/= 0 ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR ) -> A =/= 0 ) |
| 5 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR ) -> B e. RR ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_recnd | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 7 |  | #P_cxpef | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ A =/= 0 /\ B e. CC ) -> ( A ^c B ) = ( exp ` ( B x. ( log ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 2, 4, 6, 7 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR ) -> ( A ^c B ) = ( exp ` ( B x. ( log ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR ) -> ( log ` ( A ^c B ) ) = ( log ` ( exp ` ( B x. ( log ` A ) ) ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_id | |- ( B e. RR -> B e. RR ) |
| 11 |  | #P_relogcl | |- ( A e. RR+ -> ( log ` A ) e. RR ) |
| 12 |  | #P_remulcl | |- ( ( B e. RR /\ ( log ` A ) e. RR ) -> ( B x. ( log ` A ) ) e. RR ) |
| 13 | 10, 11, 12 | #P_syl2anr | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR ) -> ( B x. ( log ` A ) ) e. RR ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_relogefd | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR ) -> ( log ` ( exp ` ( B x. ( log ` A ) ) ) ) = ( B x. ( log ` A ) ) ) |
| 15 | 9, 14 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( A e. RR+ /\ B e. RR ) -> ( log ` ( A ^c B ) ) = ( B x. ( log ` A ) ) ) |
